roles.title: Multiplatform Mobile Software Engineer
duties: Develop and optimize React Native-based mobile application for payment solutions
Implement complex functionalities leveraging React Native for UI development
Ensure seamless integration with backend services via RESTful APIs
Optimize application for performance and memory efficiency
Implement state management solutions using Redux and Context API
Maintain application scalability and security standards
Contribute to code quality through code reviews and CI/CD practices

roles.title: Lead iOS Software Engineer & Architect
duties: Lead enhancement of existing iOS applications while implementing new features
Address technical debt through strategic system improvements
Transform system architecture and development paradigm
Reorganize shared code into interlinked modules for improved maintainability
Optimize code reuse and project flexibility for refactoring
Foster adaptable, scalable, and robust software infrastructure

roles.title: iOS Software Engineer

Ensured seamless user experience across application ecosystem
Balanced user experience with functional requirements

Improved software stability and performance significantly

roles.title: Lead iOS Software Engineer / iOS Software Engineer
duties: Developed highly modular, maintainable, and scalable iOS code
Integrated third-party hardware including payment card readers

Led technical initiatives for application modernization

projects.name: Personal Website - Vapor Swift
projects.description: This personal website built entirely with Vapor Swift featuring automated static site generation, internationalization, dark/light themes, and full CI/CD pipeline.

resume_string: Accomplished Software Developer and Research Professional with over 10 years of extensive experience blending development and research roles. Currently serving as Multiplatform Mobile Software Engineer, specializing in React Native development for payment solutions. Former Lead iOS Software Engineer and Architect with expertise in designing and executing complex features with user-centric approach. Champion of maintainable and readable source code, adhering to best practices and industry standards. Committed to continuous learning and exploring emerging technologies including React Native for multiplatform solutions.
